triptypes

Class Cruise

  • java.lang.Object
    • triptypes.VacationPackage
      • triptypes.FlightOptionalPackage
        • triptypes.Cruise

  • public class Cruise
extends FlightOptionalPackage
    This class represents a cruise package within the travel agency. It stores required information about the cruise ship, including departure and arrival times. It allows for optional off-ship excursion packages to be added to a trip for an additional price.
    Author:
    bdorn

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cruise

        public Cruise(java.lang.String name,
              int numDays,
              java.lang.String vesselName,
              java.lang.String portCity,
              java.util.Calendar departs,
              java.util.Calendar returns,
              double basePrice)
        Creates a new Cruise trip with specified values for all data except optional excursions.
        Parameters:
        name - The promotional name of the travel package.
        numDays - The number of days for this travel package.
        vesselName - The ship name for this Cruise.
        portCity - The departure port for this Cruise.
        departs - The time and date of departure from the port.
        returns - The time and date of return to the port.
        basePrice - The base price for the cheapest tier cabin (interior) on the ship. Cabin upgrades can be accommodated through a subsequent setter call.

    • Method Detail

      • addExcursion

        public void addExcursion(java.lang.String excursion,
                         double price)
        Adds a named excursion to this Cruise. Excursions may or may not have an additional charge associated. A maximum of 10 excursions can be added.
        Parameters:
        excursion - The name of the excursion to add to this package. Empty excursion values are invalid and should not result in a change to the Cruise package configuration.
        price - The price of the excursion. Prices must be >= 0, with any negative values being treated as equivalent to 0.

      • getExcursions

        public java.lang.String[] getExcursions()
        Retrieves an array containing all of the excursions which have been added to this Cruise, in the order in which they were added.
        Returns:
        The list of excursions.

      • setCabinType

        public void setCabinType(CabinType cabin)
        Updates the cabin configuration for this Cruise. This method can be used to upgrade a cruise from the base price corresponding to the cheapest cabin (an interior cabin without any ocean view).
        Parameters:
        cabin - A valid alternate cabin level for this package.

      • getCabinType

        public CabinType getCabinType()
        Retrieves the cabin level currently associated with this Cruise package.
        Returns:
        The current cabin level.

      • getHomePort

        public java.lang.String getHomePort()
        Retrieves the home port of the cruise ship for this package.
        Returns:
        The city from which this Cruise departs.

      • getDepartureDate

        public java.util.Calendar getDepartureDate()
        Retrieves the date and time of departure for this Cruise.
        Returns:
        The departure time at the port.

        public java.util.Calendar getReturnDate()
        Retrieves the date and time of arrival for this Cruise.
        Returns:
        The arrival time at the port.

      • getVesselName

        public java.lang.String getVesselName()
        Retrieves the name of ship sailing for this Cruise.
        Returns:
        The ship name.

      • getExcursionCosts

        public double getExcursionCosts()
        Retrieves the total cost for all added excursions on this Cruise.
        Returns:
        The excursions total in US Dollars.

      • getNumExcursions

        public int getNumExcursions()
        Retrieves the number of excursions which have been added to this Cruise package.
        Returns:
        The number of excursions.

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice()
        Retrieves the full price of this Cruise package, including pre-cruise flight arrangements (as applicable), full lodging costs, and any additional excursion costs.
        Specified by:
        getPrice in class VacationPackage
        Returns:
        The price of a vacation package in US Dollars.

      • getDepositAmount

        public double getDepositAmount()
        Retrieves the deposit amount required upfront for this Cruise. Cruise packages require that all applicable flight costs and 50% of expected lodging costs are paid at the time of booking. Optional excursion costs are not included in the deposit amount, but must be paid prior to departure.
        Specified by:
        getDepositAmount in class VacationPackage
        Returns:
        The deposit amount required in US Dollars.

      • getLodgingCost

        public double getLodgingCost()
        Retrieves the lodging charge for this Cruise package, calculated from the base price scaled based on the cabin level according to the following fee schedule: 
        Interior Room:     100% of base price
Ocean View Room:   150% of base price
Balcony Room:      300% of base price
Luxury Suite:      500% of base price
        Specified by:
        getLodgingCost in class VacationPackage
        Returns:
        The lodging subtotal in US Dollars.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Retrieves a formatted string summarizing this Cruise package. The required format for this string includes information as described by FlightOptionalPackage followed by cruise details on the next line. The second line should be prefixed with 11 blank spaces for alignment below the trip name. An example of this format is shown here: 
        $ 2499.99  Bermuda Triangle...and Maybe Back (Flight Not Included)
           Cruising from Miami on the Caribbean Princess
        If optional excursions have been added, a parenthetical suffix will be added indicating how many excursions are included: 
        $ 2499.99  Bermuda Triangle...and Maybe Back (Flight Not Included)
           Cruising from Miami on the Caribbean Princess (includes 4 excursions)
        Overrides:
        toString in class FlightOptionalPackage
        Returns:
        The formatted string summary.
